ref: 8099 pāyasa ʻ made of milk ʼ Gr̥Śr., m.n. ʻ food prepared with milk, rice boiled in milk ʼ Mn. [páyas -- ]
Pa. pāyāsa -- m. ʻ rice boiled in milk ʼ (X āsa -- ʻ food ʼ < āśá -- ?), -- pāyasa -- (a(.l. Mahāvaṁsa 196, 220);
Pk. pāyasa<-> m.n. ʻ milk, rice boiled in milk ʼ;
A. pāha ʻ rice boiled in milk ʼ;
Si. payas ʻ fluid, water, milk ʼ and (altern. < páyas -- ) paya, pā.
